headline: Playing the beverage space: Why BofA's top stock pick isn't PepsiCo
summary: PepsiCo (PEP) is making big changes in some of its snack products in an effort to appeal to more health-conscious consumers. Bank of America Securities food and beverage analyst Peter Galbo joins Market Domination with Josh Lipton to discuss how to play the food and beverage space as shifting consumer attitudes are weighing on names like PepsiCo and Corona-maker Constellation Brands (STZ). Galbo also shares one stock in the space he has a Buy rating on. Check out Yahoo Finance's interviews with Constellation Brands CEO Bill Newlands and PepsiCo CEO Ramon Laguarta. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

Galbo also shares one stock in the space he has a Buy rating on.

Check out Yahoo Finance's interviews with Constellation Brands CEO Bill Newlands and PepsiCo CEO Ramon Laguarta.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Tilray isn't sacrificing efficiency on its beer brands, CEO says
summary: Tilray Brands (TLRY) stock is fired up on Thursday, up nearly 25% after the cannabis company beat fiscal first quarter estimates: revenue of $210 million (vs. estimates of $205 million) and flat adjusted earnings of $0.00 per share (vs. estimates of a loss of $0.03). The company also owns and operates a variety of cannabis products and alcohol brands, including a handful of breweries. Tilray Brands Chairman and CEO Irwin Simon comments on Tilray's beverage operations and its cost-saving strategies over the years that have maintained efficiency. Also read up on Yahoo Finance's interview with Constellation Brands (STZ) CEO Bill Newlands, who speaks on navigating the tough consumer environment for his company's beer brands. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: How Constellation Brands' (STZ) Earnings Beat and Capital Returns Shape Its Investor Outlook
summary: Constellation Brands recently reported its fiscal second quarter 2026 results, delivering earnings and revenue that surpassed Wall Street expectations, even as sales fell year over year and the company lowered its full-year guidance due to demand softness and rising costs. In addition to the earnings beat, the company reiterated its focus on market share gains, announced substantial share repurchases, and affirmed its quarterly dividend, underlining its commitment to shareholder returns even...

In addition to the earnings beat, the company reiterated its focus on market share gains, announced substantial share repurchases, and affirmed its quarterly dividend, underlining its commitment to shareholder returns even...

headline: 3 Low-Volatility Stocks We Find Risky
summary: Stability is great, but low-volatility stocks may struggle to deliver market-beating returns over time as they sometimes underperform during bull markets.

content.title: 3 Low-Volatility Stocks We Find Risky
content.summary: Stability is great, but low-volatility stocks may struggle to deliver market-beating returns over time as they sometimes underperform during bull markets.
